devices

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • devices.Device
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cooler, Heater

    public abstract class Device
extends java.lang.Object

    This class contain common features, that every device have like turn on, turn off

    This class contain common features, that every device have like turn on, turn off
